website_summaries.verdict: A feature-rich sous vide machine that is sturdy and easy to use.
pros: Temperature range is from 77 - 211.8 degrees F. One-hand operation
Has a low-water automatic shutoff feature
cons: Manual can be a little vague
Scroll wheel scrolls too fast or too slow
Some reports that this model dies after a few months

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Was very curious about this cooking technique. Tried. Do not regret. Meat turns out amazingly juicy and soft. Onsen tamago were just right!! Love this device.
customer_reviews.author: Ksana

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.text: Using this is amazingly easy. I start with water from my tap as hot as it goes and then set up the Wancle. It warms to temperature in just a few minutes. I pictured it taking a half hour or more but it's more like 10 minutes. I am enjoying trying various recipes I've found on the internet. Everything has been good!! I like that I can walk away and do things around the house without any fear of something burning.
customer_reviews.author: B. Raker

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this sous vide. I did not want one that needed to connect to my cell hone/internet. This one is quiet and works quite well. I just cooked a 3 pound prime rib roast at 125 degrees for 6 hours yesterday, finished it off for a few minutes in a 475 degree oven to brown, and it was absolutely perfect. I'll be relying on this, hopefully, for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: GinMT

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be any easier to use, I like that I can control it without a smart phone, don't need an app. If you want a sous vide appliance and you don't want to have to cook with a smart phone I would advise you get this one. Excellent price, easy to set and hold the temperature exactly.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Best steak ever
customer_reviews.text: Best steak I have ever cooked. I felt weird the entire time, like I needed to to turn meat or check the temp - but nope, this guy held steady within .5 degrees of what I select. The timer is nice. Easy to use. I am in love with this machine. It takes up little space!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Rasar

customer_reviews.title: Great features
customer_reviews.text: Three features I really like are 1) the pistol grip handle opens the 'jaws' to make fixing the appliance to the water container easy and quick 2) the temperature and time settings are easy and fairly intuitive and 3) the 'face' is angled such that it is readable from across the room.
customer_reviews.author: Spyderman

customer_reviews.title: Works well & performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought one these sous vide gizmos for my son last year and he raves about it. He even upgraded the quality of meat he buys to get the maximum flave and texture. This year I bought myself one and I'm loving it too. It's simple to use and keeps the water at the set temperature (I tested this with my instant read thermometer) I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: hairyliver

customer_reviews.title: Works great and it is easy to see the temp and time
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a large plastic tub and it works just great for sous vide cooking of various items. It seems to keep an accurate temp and circulates the water quietly. Just seems like a great product to me. This is my second unit because the first one became difficult to get the heater to start every time. The first one still works, but I like it so much that I wanted a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Good Price to Jump in the Game
customer_reviews.text: Have done a number of roasts, steak and pork chops with out a hitch. The interface is very simple on the device. The included manual is good and makes it clear how to hit the right timings. For the price cannot see a reason to pay 2-4x more.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Ottaway

customer_reviews.title: I love this cooker
customer_reviews.text: This has changed my culinary world. I love this cooker. The spinning impeller at times can vibrate, but it does not change how awesome this is. Check out Sous Vide Everything on YouTube for some great Sous Vide content.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Dally

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied, would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I live in Philippines and have a 220 volt to 120 volt reducer and this unit has performed flawlessly on it. I have used it quite a few times and find the meat, especially chicken and pork are cooked to perfection. Here the pork is always tough but with this unit it is always tender. The chicken is always tasty and juicy, no more tough stringy chicken breasts. I have even made hams in a ham cooker with the unit and it cooks them perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Ferlingere

customer_reviews.title: Out of the mail?  And into hot water!!
customer_reviews.text: Received the unit in the mail today, and immediately put it to use. A two day cooking of a pork butt roast, that will come out the other end as pulled pork! I don't know how well it will do? But what I can say is the programming is a god-send easy! Especially in comparisons to the 'stick' it replaces! ..Thank ..You ..Wancle!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 6 months, used it about 6 times to make egg bites. Started annoying beeping on the third time, on the 7th time just won't work. The seller says to go thru Amazon, and the amazon website says too late to return and product support window is closed! Expect it to last more than 6 times! Do not buy, unless you like throwing $$ away. I now make the egg bites in the oven--they come out great.
customer_reviews.author: diane conley

customer_reviews.title: Broke during second use.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after one use. During the second use it stopped working and not sure if my meat is wasted because I do not know when it stopped working. I’m in the return window so I’m lucky. I purchased a different Souse Vide.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Used once, and it broke. It's also just a pain to use. Bad controls. Skip this one guys.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Quit working one week out of return policy
customer_reviews.text: Although I enjoyed using this product for about four months, it quit working one week out of return policy. The face of the device flickers and I can no longer set the timer on it. Without the timer, it won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Carol J.

customer_reviews.title: Great solid machine.
customer_reviews.text: Works first time. No problems. Food turned out as expected. Much better than my old one that died due to break of wire monitoring water level. As good as my Avona. It's an 850 watt heater element, and indeed it may take 10 - 25 minutes longer to heat the water to the desired temperature. Considering I usually use it for 4 to 48 hours, what's 15 minutes. A solid machine. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Soo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We love this and cook all out meat type products with it.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: No stupid phone app to complicate things.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great appliance. Sturdy construction, and simple control. I've cooked several different meats including steaks and wild game. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first sous vide cooker. This one is no frills but does the job! I have cooked steak, fish and chicken all to perfection with this handy device. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: EleMonte

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy using it so far. Only have cooked steaks and a beef roast. Really great I finish off on the grill. Just to lay down grill marks and get a crust on the meat. Holds temp well and the moisture is retained. Also I add my spices in the bag before cooking. This works well. You can go from fresh or from frozen the dish comes out the same. I'm buying the bags for this next.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: My brother in law had one and I wanted to try one. Tue first steaks i cooked came out perfect and everyone really enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: Avery N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic for making steaks. We will buy thick sirloins, put them in zip locs, take the air out, and set them at 130 for two hours. They come out amazing. A minute each side on the grill and they taste like you're eating filet! This tool is easy to use, no need for wireless to keep water at a set temp.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey3

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly yet capable Sous Vide cooker
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes but was nervous due to the unusually reasonable price of the unit. Needn't have worried. Worked a charm. First up three 1.5 in. rib-eye steaks cooked to 131 degrees after a short marinade cycle. Perfect. Nothing not to like really.
customer_reviews.author: Sean A. Riordan

customer_reviews.title: Simple quality, two controls, no app
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for here. I really like it. I don’t want extra, I want sous vide. This machine heats quickly. Is the user interface the best? I dunno but I figured it out without a phone. Its a count down clock and a temperature setting, beyond that its sous vide time. The temperature stays consistent and I really like the universal clamp. Squeeze the handle to open the clamp and the notches find the rim of the container. Put those savings toward meats. Google the time and temp, or get expert by trying. Or buy a fancy app.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, quiet & easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all. The temp is super accurate and easy to understand and set. Easy to setup for cooking in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for a friend and she absolutely loves it! She uses it all the time and said it is very easy to use and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the accuracy as I checked the temp with an industrial pyrometer. Really accurate and affordable to introduce you so sous vide. First time I've made pork tenderloin exactly as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rybak

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how quiet this is. I had another make and my wife always complained about the noise level. This one was so quiet she asked me if it was on.
customer_reviews.author: jpkinco

customer_reviews.title: This will make you a superstar!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how many times I've been grilling steak, became bored with waiting, got distracted and charred the meat. My kids are quite aware of it. I should probably be on Adderall. This thing flattens the grilling learning curve. Now I make wonderful steaks. Use the grill running as hot as you can get it to just sear the outside in a minute or so. The inside will have already been cooked to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: pjh421

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It holds temp and can be time-programmed. Simple operation and works as you want. Great tool for grilling and probably every bit as good as others at this price point. Heating element appears to be stainless and has held up well so far. User interface is not complicated, but also not intuitive. I always long for old-school dials...
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Pownall de Groot

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I love Sous Vide and this unit does the trick. Simple to use with three basic features needed. Time, heat, and circulation. This unit replaces another brand that failed after many uses. This one does just what I ask it to do. Nothing more nothing less. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Fej 19

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't heat to proper temperature
customer_reviews.text: For my first cook I tried to do boiled eggs. I tried to get it where the egg just barely gets cooked and when that didn't work I left the eggs in for many hours at a higher temperature than the cook book stated and the eggs still didn't cook to where they were edible, unless you like near raw eggs. I then tried again a week or two later with a different bag (regular plastic) and it was the same result. After that I decided not to waste money on trying a steak and sent the unit back.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use once you read the instructions lol. We love it makes our steaks perfect. Thank so much!
customer_reviews.author: Alysia B

customer_reviews.title: Good starter unit, but you will need a better one soon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an economical way to get into Sous Vide. For that, it was great. Simple, easy learning curve. After 3 months of semi steady use, and great results, the unit has become unresponsive and flat does not work. I have made 3 separate attempts to use it to no avail. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: It was damaged when it arrive. Product itself doesn’t come with box.
customer_reviews.author: Ph

customer_reviews.title: First tool for Sous Vide cooking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Wancle because it fell somewhat in mid-range pricing. Although, the tool does seem to cook well the ease of use is a little challenging. Usually, after one or two times of using a kitchen gadget, one can easily remember how to operate it. When plugging in to use, the display is not easy and often times I have to reread the manual. The display face should clearly have a button for temperature and another for time. The one button for both, along with the side wheel are pretty sensitive. Just when I think, I have it set. The tool restarts and I have to reset it all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought my fiance for Christmas and he loved it! We made steaks with it recently and although they were $10 steaks, they had so much flavor and were cooked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: first time user of an immersion
customer_reviews.text: First time cooking sous vide and it was easy to use and the steaks i've cook comes out so tender.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Works, review instructions with each food!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, but takes some getting used to for the user interface. Programming is awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Spring K.

customer_reviews.title: Sous Vide Su Preme
customer_reviews.text: excellent. Sous Vide Su Preme. A bit sensitive to temp/time changes using the scroll wheel, but heck, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Kegan

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: Very simple control design. I use it every week to make chicken. It comes out slightly pink, but it is pastuerized after 149F for 1.5 hours
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haskins

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my Anova and wasn’t disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My Anova died, I replaced it with this, it was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lumenstein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for steaks
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Steaks are so tender. Definitely recommend. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Sous vide where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Has totally taken the guess work out of cooking perfect meats. I bought this as a deal of the day and figured if it wasn’t worth the hype I would return it. If it broke today I would order a new one immediately.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, cooks my food to perfection! No complaints, I use it almost everyday
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy sous vide that doesn’t give recepies
customer_reviews.text: With NO recipes specific for this unit, the Amazon community was great enough to stir me to other units with recipes(thank you). I selected one for shrimp pasta 135F & 30 min. Results: tough & rubbery shrimp
customer_reviews.author: Tourguide

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and loved it - thought it was a great product. Then bought some rather expensive steaks to sous vide, prepped and bagged them, filled a pot of water, plugged in this sous vide appliance - nothing. Dead. Read the manual from beginning to end - no helpful suggestions. Now out of warranty period, so a complete waste of money. Apparently I am not alone, judging from similar negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Never heard of this and tried it and it works great for steaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this sous vide!!!
customer_reviews.text: We made some NY strip steaks to break it in and they turned out phenomenal! We set the temp to 135° and let me cook for 2 hours, they came out with a perfect hot pink center and as tend as could be. This machine was easy to use and clean up was a breeze! I'd highly recommend this sous vide to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rheanna Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I order my first one had to have it replace after second use the replace did the same thong
customer_reviews.author: angelo

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this just recently and am disappointed. The temperature is off it reads one temperature but when I test it with my Therma Pens the temperature is not the same. I don't think it is that easy to program you really have to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: DZ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item. My first try at Sous Vide
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. I’ve been using it for a while and like the process
customer_reviews.author: A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my sous vide. A must have kitchen appliance. Completely changed the way I cook.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Spend an extra $20 for a good cooker
customer_reviews.text: - It beeps loudly and repeatedly - It's fragile and it breaks easily - It lacks the more advanced features other sous vides have - "Clip on anything" isn't as good as it sounds you basically need a good sous vide basin anyways
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply build...worked only twice
customer_reviews.text: This item uses very cheap electronics for their "touch screen". With no physical buttons, you're completely relying on this ultra cheap screen to function; for me it worked only 2 times. Now the start button is completely unresponsive. Additionally, the "wheel" used to set temp and time is way too sensitive, and makes operation annoying. I recommend buying something with a real, recognizable name brand....not this cheapo crap. **Full disclosure** I opted for a replacement, just to give them a fair shake. I'll update this if the replacement functions for longer than 3 uses. But if it's your first purchase, I'd find another option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is hard to get the unit situated to be able to read the temp and time
customer_reviews.text: Unit is quiet and works OK. The only problem is the indicator area which points backwards from all the other circulators on the market which makes it hard to attach and read without moving around the container. 6/23/20 Can't find any Sous vide container or container cover to fit this circulator. If you consider purchasing I would go with the darling of circulators, the Anova. However, the Wancle is very easy to use but, it is a challenge to find a container with lid for it. I am considering returning the Wancle because of the problem getting suitable sous vide containers. Really too bad
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The Sous vide cooker would intermittently cut out and not circulate nor heat water randomly. I tried different outlets to the same thing. Ruined my food.
customer_reviews.author: Donald K.

customer_reviews.title: Best Steak ever...
customer_reviews.text: Just get it. This absolutely changes the way you cook meat (and for the better). Cooking the steak with this, (~127 degrees for about 75 minutes), and then sear on cast iron skillet as hot as you can get it (with a quarter stick of butter). OK, now I'm hungry....
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mataya

customer_reviews.title: Getting it to start can prove difficult.
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for a little while now and I have used it twice. I have cooked 5 steaks at once with it which was very useful. Temp control is great and it isn't too loud. However, dial to set the temp and the button to actually start the machine kinda suck. The button won't actually start the machine on the first press. I have to push it in a weird way that's hard to explain. and the dial seems to move way too loose. It'd be three stars if the steaks didn't turn out so good!
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Lonzo Clark III

customer_reviews.title: Spur of the moment purchase...
customer_reviews.text: This was a spur of the moment, middle of the night, I can't sleep purchase. But one I do not regret. I'd watched Top Chef and saw it being used time and again and thought 'just another tool I'll never use' but I was so wrong. So far I've cooked eggs, beef tri tip, stuffed pork loin roast and corned beef all were easy and successful - no scrubbing pots and pans, no boil overs to clean up and best of all nothing over cooked or burnt. I prepared individual pumpkin custard in mason jars and am looking forward to trying my hand at yogurt. My kids will be inheriting the slow cooker and instant pot.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great little Sous Vide circulator!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a workhorse. I have toted it all over the country, and none too gently - it always works. The temperature control is pretty spot-on, the clip could be a bit wider opening (I use mine on a cooler) but all in all, this has been a great investment in my opinion. I have had several Gourmia Sous Vide circulators that failed within months of purchase. Eventually, Gourmia got tired of replacing them and wanted me to ship it to NY for evaluation (at my own expense). Pass. This Wancle has just kept on and on without skipping a beat. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: mjtf1

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: This will make the greatest steak you have ever cooked yourself
customer_reviews.author: A.A. Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best pork chops EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once so far. I did pork chops. Pork chops are particularly difficult since the difference between them being adequately cooked for food safety and being cooked too tough just doesn't exist. This controls the temperature very accurately so if you cook the food long enough food safety is assured and the pork doesn't get overcooked. My daughter, who claims to be a vegetarian, even commented they were the best ever. I'm looking forward to using it to cook chicken and beef.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Buttman

customer_reviews.title: Short Life, will need replacement
customer_reviews.text: Had this sous vide for maybe 1 year and used it 5-10 times, the temperature and time control is super difficult to set precisely without it jumping around. Recently I plugged it in and it won’t even turn on any more. But once cry once get a better sous vide machine, if you buy this one your are guaranteed to have to replace it sooner rather than later
customer_reviews.author: Blake Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: short circuited
customer_reviews.text: kept short circuiting wall outlets with each use. didn't know stopped working after short-circuit and thus had no idea how long my meat was sitting idle uncooked. realized definitely need app to monitor sous vide if/when shuts down or stops for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after three months.
customer_reviews.text: This machine stopped working after a whopping 5 uses over a three month period. When it did work, it worked well. After three months I couldn't set the temps or times any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No headline, birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our son. He LOVES it!!!! I don't know how this operates, but when we discovered he wanted one, we had you send it to him. He was beyond happy. Started using it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Karin A Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Heating the hot tub
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I bought it to heat up my 155 gallon hot tub. It will bring the temp up 10 to 12 degrees in less than 6 hours. Very easy to use. Please be safe and smart and remove before getting in the hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Long

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but controls are wonky
customer_reviews.text: This is my first foray into Sous Vide cooking. The Wancle unit does a good job cooking once it decides to turn on. The control dial works fine, but when you push the start/pause switch it's very finicky. Sometimes it works great. Sometimes it takes 10 minutes to get the darn unit to turn on. Frustrating, but I don't use it enough to warrant upgrading to an Anova or Joule.
customer_reviews.author: Keith G.

customer_reviews.title: Confusing Control Panel buttons
customer_reviews.text: It's been almost a year now since we bought this sous vide cooker, and we do like this method of cooking. But we don't use the cooker everyday so everytime I pull this cooker out, I've to re-learn how all the dials and buttons work. I'm usually pretty tech-savvy, but this one got me! The obvious solid triangle button seems to be the answer to turning the machine on, but since it also functions to pause the machine, it's not clear how one should press it to turn the cooker on...it needs a better user interface!
customer_reviews.author: Ker

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month of use
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first, but broke after one month of use. It turns on and makes a very loud high-pitched sound and doesn't run. ** UPDATED REVIEW ** I was able to get a full refund from the company who makes this product after a bit of back and forth. Once they accepted that it was indeed broken (and not just user error), they offered me a 99% off coupon for a new one, but then refunded me when I declined the offer. I'm very happy with the company's response.
customer_reviews.author: Story

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The UI is nice but my unit has trouble keeping a precise temperature. Maybe its the pot I'm using but I set it to 130 and I'm fluctuating between 129.9 and 130.1. The timer will not start if the temp isn't perfectly 130. I just dropped it by a .1 to 129.9 and it started the timer. So set it a .1 higher your desired temp incase you run into that or just keep track of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: After lots of research, I settled upon Wancle sous vide as a gift for my bf. He LOVES it and uses it a couple times a week for all types of meat: chicken, pork, steak, salmon, etc. It makes eating chicken much more enjoyable, always juicy and cooked to perfection throughout. Once cooked, he either torches it for a charred taste or throws it on the pan to sear. You’ll never have to fear under-cooked meat or cooking half the steak medium and the other half medium well again. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Lack of information makes using it almost impossible
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to use when the instruction booklet doesn’t explain what to do other than setting it up. No troubleshooting. It appears that if the water varries at all the clock stops running. Made an egg that was beyond poached but still very good and made tenderloin. Impressed with the limited food I’ve made just disappointed with this particular machine. I’ll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin W

customer_reviews.title: easy to operate and accurate temperature
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this one for Thanksgiving. I used a thermometer to confirm the temperature, and the water temperature is very close to the desired one. Within 1 degree difference, but that might be the error of the thermometer I used. I used this to cook a steak, perfect outcome. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool that I use five out of seven days a week
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best gadgets to own when living in an apartment. Don't want to stink your house up with frying steaks / chicken? Then use a sous vide with reusable plastic bags, then sear the meat using a butane torch! Best steaks ever! Only complaint is that the temperature / timer jumps around a bit when trying to set the temperature. However, once set its fine! GET ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This machine makes amazing meals!
customer_reviews.text: An immersion circulator that doesn't connect to my phone! Easy to use. We have done ribeye streaks, chicken breasts, and a beautiful chuck roast since it arrived a week ago. I have already recommended it to a dozen people and they are quite interested in one that doesn't have a phone interface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to mount and to configure
customer_reviews.text: This would not clip over my sous vide 32 quart containers. The way the clip on this unit works prevents it from working with the lip on the containers. My other sous vide devices don't have this problem. The other issue is that it is difficult to program. This is because of the timer feature. All my sous vide devices need to do is set the temp with a dial and press start. This one is too complicated for such a simple operation.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Packard

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this garbage
customer_reviews.text: Used the unit about 5 times before it stopped working. Now after plugging in, and setting a time and temperature, the play button flashes red as if there is some internal error. After reading other reviews this seems to be a common problem. Don't buy this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Not for beginners. It offers an E-cookbook which is a joke. If you have not used sous vide before this item is not for you. Very disappointed since I was looking forward to it but it’s useless to me without instructions or guide.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Heller

customer_reviews.title: Needs more details
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are not thorough enough. I can’t seem to get the e recipe book in English. I have used it once cooking eggs from another web site. Very disappointing outcome. I can’t give an evaluation on the product until I get an English version of the recipe book and cook a variety of items.ne
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: timer and electronics are a joke on this one.
customer_reviews.text: bought the line that since the electronics were "to the side" they were less likely to have issues. well? 2 for 2 bad ones. 2 for 2 tell me there is something seriously wrong with the product. they worked the first couple of tests. then nope.
customer_reviews.author: Kat D.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine, but no 5 stars. Had it for 4 months, one day it began to make noise. The ad says 2 year warranty. Finally reached the customer service which was not easy. After 2 days they sent me a coupon to get a new one. Well see how long the new one lasts..
customer_reviews.author: SSCL

customer_reviews.title: Quick, Easy, Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Boxed well, came up to temp quickly, very sturdy, love the clamp and manual controls. No cookbook...even a few starter recipies would be helpful. Found pork chop recipe online...DELICIOUS! So moist didnt have to babysit while cooking. Would be nice to have something to store it in...hard plastic to protect. Too big for kitchen drawer. All in all loving the easy cooking technique
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: Use this 3 or 4 times a week. Have 2 very young kids so this make cooking meals much easier
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Life changing.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my husband and when we finally took on the “challenge” to learn a new kitchen tool we LOVED it and used it for weeks straight. We use it in conjunction with the joule app which made things even easier as far as times and temps. We put our protein in ziplock bags and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: My mistake it does work.
customer_reviews.text: I have to eat humble pie and change my rating as the error was mine. I accidentally switched to centigrade without realizing it, so it wouldn't accept what i wanted correctly. So I am again happy and loving my Wancle. I did have to call to get the recipe book that was to be included. I also went out and got other recipe books and online sources.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Once you figure it out since the directions suck! I like that grip handle and not having to screw it to a pot. For one person who hates to cook and tends to wander off and come back to burned food - this is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: ClassyGeek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sous vide & incredible customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this about a year ago and LOVED using it for cooking fish and steak. Made a huge difference in elevating the quality and taste of our meals. We ran into a malfunction with our first sous vide and reached out to their customer service team to inquire about the issue and they were so responsive and nice to work with. They sent us a new sous vide right away. Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chante Owens

customer_reviews.title: Broke in under a year
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 8 months then the touch buttons stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Travis L Braxton

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product for the money. This is my second sous vide. I HATE that it can run out of time. The timer feature sucks. Other than that it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Silver fox

customer_reviews.title: Nice no issues
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Powerful accurate. A little finicky upon initial set up. After that very easy. Cleans well. Have cooked 15lbs of meat, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: firedude

customer_reviews.title: Crystalized Honey
customer_reviews.text: Being a bee keeper takes consistent effort. Had a summer during which all the honey crystalized. This was used to keep a consistent temperature to decrystalize the honey without harming it. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Really good machine! (so far)...!
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it although it was a little difficult to understand the first time. By the second time I figured it out. When I asked about the cookbook, I had a terrible time getting it from the manufacturer, but I got it from Amazon. Now that I’ve had the device a couple weeks, I’ve used it almost every day and I really like it. I don’t need Wi-Fi connectivity because I live so far out in the sticks it wouldn’t do me any good. My egg bites, chicken, and fish have been delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon P.

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Product didn’t work... gave it as a gift and by the time it was used, the time to replace had expired... so much for planning... junk!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hromadka

customer_reviews.title: Check Water Temp!
customer_reviews.text: Use it multiple times a week! Drop dinner in once home, forget it, eat when I’m ready! Never over cooked. Temp of mine is about 2-3 degrees off so be sure to check your water temp with thermometer for adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Missing Clips to Hold Bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought this identical Wancle Sous Vide last Christmas for my husband. It has been such a great addition to our cooking that I decided to buy another for him this Christmas so we could do chicken and meat for the same dinner. However last year's Wancle had 4 clips to hold the vacuum bagged meat in the pot, but this order had none - a little disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: I do like this device. It works well. I wish they included some recipes or at least recommended temperature for different types of meat
customer_reviews.author: Customer11

customer_reviews.title: Great beginning piece
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s a great item for a start into Sous vide cooking. The interface is simple. It takes awhile to get to correct temp and fluctuated a bit but i adjusted this by adding two degrees upward of what i needed. Overal i think it’s a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Traeye

product_meta.title: Sous Vide Cooker, Wancle Thermal Immersion Circulator, with Recipe E-Cookbook, Accurate Temperature Digital Timer, Ultra-quiet, 850 Watts, 120V, Stainless Steel/Black
product_meta.description:
Sous vide - Your culinary game changer 
sous vide is a method of cooking that makes it super simple to achieve professional-quality results at home. The immersion circulator utilizes accurate time temperature control to deliver super-juicy, flavor-packed meals, every time. Professional chefs and restaurants started To rely on this immersion circulator since 10 years ago. 

why choose our sous vide cooker? 

cooking meat and seafood.
tastier.
food safety.
food that is cooked sous vide is pasteurized and safe from foodborne contaminants caused by biological pathogens.sous vide cooking avoids the need for you to time things just right. You can focus on another task, no more undercooked, chewy or burnt food.

great for the multitasking cook.
sous vide cooker allow you have a bigger window of time to play with If you are multitasking in the kitchen. Conventional cooking is much less forgiving.

waste reduction.
cooking steps are much easier than you might think
1.Attach your sous vide cooker to a pot, set the time and temperature according to your desired level of doneness.
2.Put your food in a sealed bag and clip it to the side of the water pot. 
3.Finish by searing, grilling, or broiling the food to add a crispy, golden exterior layer.Finish by searing, grilling, or broiling the food to add a crispy, golden exterior layer.
feature_bullets: Sou Vide Cooker Brings Professional Restaurant Cooking Technology To Home: Michelin restaurant level quality, cook everything from Beef, Chicken, Pork, Seafood, Egg, Pasta, Chocolate, Baking, Salad, Dessert, Breakfast, Cocktail to Vegetarian. No fuss, no noise, no overcooking anymore, best deal to bring professional cooking to home.

PERFECT DONENESS AND ACCURATE TIMER: Digital control panel makes the temperature accurate to 0.1°C and time to minutes. Wide range of temperature (25-99.9°C)(77°F-211.8°F) and timecontrol (Max 99h 59mins) allows you to cook any type of food you like and Sous vide cooking retains more nutrients and vitamins than other cooking methods. Cooking at home with sous vide ensures and increases food safety.

INCREDIBLE EASY TO USE: Unlike other immersion circulators, those with WIFI and Bluetooth feature are thought as over-complicated and increase your cost. focus on the core functionality of the sous vide cooker itself. Stainless steel sleeve makes it extremely easy to clean and dry out. No need for other fancy equipment.

CLEVER DESIGN, SINGLE-HAND OPERATION: Attach sous vide cooker to any water-filled pot you already have, put your ingredients in a sealed bag or glass jar into the pot, set time and temperature, then press start with one hand to start the process; Curved design prevents control panel from mist; Food grade stainless steel; Overheat and low water level protection mechanism.

WORRY-FREE SHOPPING: With all the certificates, sous vide machine passed Reach, RoHs, TüV, GS and ETL, we are confident of the quality of our product, therefore, we offer a 24-months warranty, please feel free to place the order.
